Detailed Description

Class PatchGeometry is the base class for geometry classes that manage index space and mesh increment information on individual patches. Patch geometry information is used for setting boundary conditions in ghost cells and is used in the inter-level transfer operators for refining or coarsening data between two patches associated with different index spaces. The boundary information for patches is actually computed by the BaseGridGeometry class.

See also:
hier::BoundaryBox
hier::BaseGridGeometry

Set the boundary box vectors for this patch geometry.

A vector of length DIM of std::vector<BoundaryBox> is passed in to be stored as the boundary boxes for this patch geometry.

bool SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::intersectsPhysicalBoundary (  )  const [inline]

Return a boolean value indicating whether the patch boundary intersects the physical domain boundary in a non-periodic direction. In other words, the return value is true when the patch has non-empty boundary boxes that lie outside the physical domain. Otherwise, the return value is false. Note that when a patch touches the "boundary" of the physical domain in a periodic direction, there are no boundary boxes to fill; the data is filled from the proper region of the domain interior in the periodic direction.

const std::vector<BoundaryBox>& SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getNodeBoundaries (  )  const [inline]

Return vector of boundary box components for patch each of which intersects the patch at a single point (i.e., 0-dim intersection between cells in patch and cells in boundary box).

References getDim(), and SAMRAI::tbox::Dimension::getValue().

const std::vector<BoundaryBox>& SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getEdgeBoundaries (  )  const [inline]

Return vector of boundary box components for patch each of which intersects the patch along a 1-dim edge (i.e., 1-dim intersection between cells in patch and cells in boundary box).

Precondition:
getDim().getValue() >= 2

References getDim(), SAMRAI::tbox::Dimension::getValue(), and TBOX_ERROR.

const std::vector<BoundaryBox>& SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getFaceBoundaries (  )  const [inline]

Return vector of boundary box components for patch each of which intersects the patch along a 2-dim face (i.e., 2-dim intersection between cells in patch and cells in boundary box).

Precondition:
getDim().getValue() >= 3

References getDim(), SAMRAI::tbox::Dimension::getValue(), and TBOX_ERROR.

const std::vector<BoundaryBox>& SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getCodimensionBoundaries ( const int  codim  )  const [inline]

Return vector of boundary box components for patch each of which intersects the patch as a (DIM - codim)-dimensional object. That is,

if DIM == 1: (codim == 1) => same components as getNodeBoundaries.

if DIM == 2, (codim == 1) => same components as getEdgeBoundaries. (codim == 2) => same components as getNodeBoundaries.

if DIM == 3, (codim == 1) => same components as getFaceBoundaries. (codim == 2) => same components as getEdgeBoundaries. (codim == 3) => same components as getNodeBoundaries.

Precondition:
(codim > 0) && (codim <= getDim().getValue()) when codim < 0 or codim > DIM.

References getDim(), and TBOX_ASSERT.

void SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::setCodimensionBoundaries ( const std::vector< BoundaryBox > &  bdry_boxes,
const int  codim 
)

Set the vector of boundary box components of the given codimension for a patch.

Precondition:
(codim > 0) && (codim <= getDim().getValue())
for each boundary_box in bdry_boxes, getBoundaryType() == codim

Box SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getBoundaryFillBox ( const BoundaryBox &  bbox,
const Box &  patch_box,
const IntVector &  gcw 
) const

Compute a box outside a physical domain that needs to be filled.

The patch box will be grown by the given ghost cell width and then intersected with the boundary box. The resulting intersection will be grown to the needed ghost cell width in the direction normal to the boundary.

Parameters:
bbox BoundaryBox representing location and type of boundary
patch_box The box for the patch where data is being filled
gcw ghost cell width to fill
Precondition:
bbox.getDim() == patch_box.getDim()
bbox.getDim() == gcw.getDim()
all components of gcw are >= 0

References SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryBox::getBoundaryType(), SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryBox::getBox(), SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryLookupTable::getDirections(), SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryBox::getLocationIndex(), SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryLookupTable::getLookupTable(), SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryLookupTable::getMaxLocationIndices(), SAMRAI::tbox::Dimension::getValue(), SAMRAI::hier::Box::grow(), SAMRAI::hier::BoundaryLookupTable::isUpper(), TBOX_ASSERT, and TBOX_ASSERT_OBJDIM_EQUALITY3.

bool SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getTouchesRegularBoundary (  )  const [inline]

Query whether patch touches a regular boundary.

Returns true if the Patch touches any non-periodic physical boundary

bool SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getTouchesPeriodicBoundary (  )  const [inline]

Query whether patch touches a regular boundary.

Returns true if the Patch touches any periodic boundary

bool SAMRAI::hier::PatchGeometry::getTouchesRegularBoundary ( int  axis,
int  upperlower 
) const [inline]

Query whether patch touches a specific regular boundary.

Returns true if the Patch touches a non-periodic physical boundary on the side of the Patch specified in the argument list. The side is specified by an axis direction and a flag specified the upper or lower side.

Parameters:
axis Axis direction normal to the side being checked
upperlower Flag should be 0 if checking the lower side in the axis direction, or 1 if checking the upper side.
Precondition:
(axis >= 0) && (axis < getDim().getValue())
(upperlower == 0) || (upperlower == 1)

References getDim(), and TBOX_ASSERT.
